name: A. Red Versus Blue
statement:
Team Red and Team Blue competed in a competitive FPS. Their match was
streamed around the world. They played a series of n matches.In the end,
it turned out Team Red won r times and Team Blue won b times. Team Blue
was less skilled than Team Red, so b was than r.You missed the stream
since you overslept, but you think that the match must have been neck
and neck since so many people watched it. So you imagine a string of
length n where the i-th character denotes who won the i-th match it is
if Team Red won or if Team Blue won. You imagine the string was such
that the number of times a team was . For example, in the series of
matches , Team Red won 3 times in a row, which is the maximum.You must
find a string satisfying the above conditions. If there are multiple
answers, print any.
